application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Works to London plane tree covered by LBE ORDER NO 118 (1981) - G1 - re-establish pollard points by crown reduction, removing up to  6m from height and 4m from lateral spread.
decision_conditions: The works hereby approved shall be carried out as closely as possible to British Standard 3998 [2010] 'Tree Works'.Reason: In the interests of the health, safety and appearance of the preserved trees.

Tree work should not be carried out during periods that are likely to interfere with or disturb breeding birds or mammals.Reason: In order to comply with the requirements of the Wildlife and Countryside Act (1981) and Conservation of Habitats and Species Regulations (2010).

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 300 metres in height (984.2 feet)
